Title: Relates to matching financing; relates to the New York state campaign finance fund and the abandoned property fund
Summary: Relates to matching financing; relates to the New York state campaign finance fund and the abandoned property fund.
LawCode: Add Art 14 Head, desig §§14-100 - 14-132 to be Title 1, add Title Head, Art 14 Title 2 §§14-200 - 14-213, El L; add §92-t, amd §95, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to matching financing; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the New York state campaign finance fund and the abandoned property fund
